document_data.name: Raithspur
document_data.mainbody: '''Raithspur''' was the Captain of the City Guard of [[Ordulin]] in [[Sembia]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Raithspur was a regal individual and a skilled warrior.
document_data.Activities: As Captain, ''circa'' [[1358 DR]], Raithspur commanded 2,000 guardsmen in policing Ordulin and sometimes coming to its defense.
document_data.Possessions: He was renowned for his collection of powerful protective [[magic item]]s.
document_data.History: During the [[Sembian Civil War]] in the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Raithspur managed to maintain control of the streets of the city under orders of the Overmistress [[Mirabeta Selkirk]].
